name: Kerala Holiday Package
packageInclude: All Drink Included,Insurance.Tour Guide,Lunch In Restaurant,All Ticket Museum

overview.Day 1: COCHIN: Arrival at Cochin Airport/ Railway Station. Begin a drive to Athirapally vazhachal waterfalls. This scenic waterfalls is a must visit attraction for tourist looking for a peaceful retreat near the lapse of the nature.
overview.Day 2: MUNNAR: Morning breakfast at the hotel, followed by a road trip to Munnar. On the way, visit Kodanad elephant care centre, Cheeyappara waterfalls, Valara waterfalls, Attukad waterfalls and spice plantations.

sightseeing.desc: Kerala is a beautiful state that conjures up the image of pristine green foliage, interlinked channels of canals, backwater and rivers, fishing boats returning at sunset, rich temples with its traditional practices and one of the most friendly, jovial and laid back people in India. These are just a few reasons which make the state a popular tourist destination of India and World. This socialist state is a successful model of socialism in India and its proper implementation sees the highest literacy rate in India.

review.title: Superb
review.name: Ravi
review.desc: I am grateful to Myoho Holidays for planning a great holiday trip for my parents.

name: Kerala Tour
packageInclude: All Drink Included,Insurance.Tour Guide,Lunch In Restaurant,All Ticket Museum

overview.Day 1: COCHIN TO MUNNAR: Meet and greet at the airport, followed by a journey to Munnar. Munnar is located at a distance of 150 Km from Cochin. Later check in to the hotel. Evening free for leisure activities. Overnight stay will be at the hotel.
overview.Day 2: MUNNAR: The evergreen hill station of Munnar is blessed with nature's delight. Munnar is home to lakes, tea gardens and various other natural attractions for tourist. Local sightseeing in Munnar includes must visit destinations for the tourist. Your local attractions include a visit to: Mattupetty, Echo Point, Kundala, Rajamala (Eravikulam National Park), Attukad, waterfalls, Pothamedu View Point.
overview.Day 3: KUMARAKOM: Early morning breakfast followed by a visit to Kumarakom. The Journey from Munnar to Kumarakom takes around 4 hours by car. Later check into the hotel. Overnight stay will at the hotel.

sightseeing.desc: Kerala is a beautiful state that conjures up the image of pristine green foliage, interlinked channels of canals, backwater and rivers, fishing boats returning at sunset, rich temples with its traditional practices and one of the most friendly, jovial and laid back people in India. These are just a few reasons which make the state a popular tourist destination of India and World. This socialist state is a successful model of socialism in India and its proper implementation sees the highest literacy rate in India.

name: Best Of Kerala with Taj Hotels
packageInclude: All Drink Included,Insurance.Tour Guide,Lunch In Restaurant,All Ticket Museum

overview.Day 1: ARRIVE COCHIN – WILLINGDON ISLAND: Arrival at Cochin airport/ railway station. Begin a drive to Willingdon Island. Willingdon Island is a man - made Island, built with dredging materials obtained when Fort Cochin was deepened in 1924. It is one of the 4 islands of Cochin (Fort Cochin, Willingdon, Vypeen and Bolgatty). Overnight stay will be in Vivanta by Taj Malabar.
overview.Day 2: COCHIN – KUMARAKOM (80 KMS, 2 HRS DRIVE): Morning breakfast at the hotel followed by a road trip to Kumarakom. On arrival, check into the hotel. Afternoon free to relax and unwind at the resort. Overnight stay will be in Vivanta by Taj Kumarakom.
overview.Day 3: IN KUMARAKOM: Relax in the resort with leisure activities for the entire day. Overnight stay will be at Vivanta by Taj Kumarakom, Kumarakom.

sightseeing.desc: Kerala is a beautiful state that conjures up the image of pristine green foliage, interlinked channels of canals, backwater and rivers, fishing boats returning at sunset, rich temples with its traditional practices and one of the most friendly, jovial and laid back people in India. These are just a few reasons which make the state a popular tourist destination of India and World. This socialist state is a successful model of socialism in India and its proper implementation sees the highest literacy rate in India.

name: Kerala Luxury Package
packageInclude: All Drink Included,Insurance.Tour Guide,Lunch In Restaurant,All Ticket Museum

overview.Day 1: KOVALAM: Our representative will meet and greet you at the Airport/Railway station. Transfer to Kovalam, experience the best of greenery in the coconut palms enriched with golden sands. On arrival, check into the beach resort. Entire day is free to relax and unwind. Enjoy the mesmerizing beach. Overnight stay will be in Leela Kempinski, Kovalam.
overview.Day 2: KOVALAM: orning breakfast at the hotel followed by a Trivandrum city tour. This includes a visit to Padmanabhaswamy temple, Horse Palace, Napier Museum, Zoo and the Srichitra Art Gallery. Return back to the hotel for Lunch. Evening is free to relax and enjoy on the beach. Overnight stay will be at The Leela Kempinski - Garden View Room. Also please note: Horse Palace, Napier Museum, Zoo and the Srichitra Art Gallery are closed on Mondays.
overview.Day 3: HOUSEBOAT: Morning breakfast at the resort, proceed to Alleppey, also famous as the Venice of the East. On reaching Alleppey, check into the traditional houseboat based on traditional Kerala style. The best way to enjoy the fascinating beauty of backwaters is by opting for a luxury cruise.

sightseeing.desc: Kerala is a beautiful state that conjures up the image of pristine green foliage, interlinked channels of canals, backwater and rivers, fishing boats returning at sunset, rich temples with its traditional practices and one of the most friendly, jovial and laid back people in India. These are just a few reasons which make the state a popular tourist destination of India and World. This socialist state is a successful model of socialism in India and its proper implementation sees the highest literacy rate in India.

name: Kerala Vacation Package
packageInclude: All Drink Included,Insurance.Tour Guide,Lunch In Restaurant,All Ticket Museum

overview.Day 1: MUNNAR: The tour begins from Cochin. In Afternoon, begin a peaceful trip by road to Munnar. Have a glimpse of the major tourist attractions on the way while traveling to Munnar. You will be exploring Kodanadu elephant care centre, Cheyyara waterfalls, Valara waterfalls, Attukadu waterfalls and Spice plantations. Visit more places of tourist interest in Munnar. Overnight stay will be in Munnar.
overview.Day 2: MUNNAR SIGHTSEEING: Morning breakfast at the hotel. Local sightseeing of Munnar includes a visit to Eravikulam National Park, Mattupetty dam, Tea estates, Eco point, Spice Plantations, Rose Garden, Photo point, Tea Museum and Blossom Park. You can also go for boating in the Lake, rock climbing and trekking Overnight stay will be at hotel in Munnar.
overview.Day 3: THEKKADY / PERIYAR: Morning breakfast at the hotel. Local sightseeing in Thekkady includes Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary (a great hub for wildlife lovers) where you can see wild elephant, boar, deer, the great Indian tiger and species of animals. Explore Mullaperiyar dam and spice plantations; you can also buy variety of species here.

sightseeing.desc: Kerala is a beautiful state that conjures up the image of pristine green foliage, interlinked channels of canals, backwater and rivers, fishing boats returning at sunset, rich temples with its traditional practices and one of the most friendly, jovial and laid back people in India. These are just a few reasons which make the state a popular tourist destination of India and World. This socialist state is a successful model of socialism in India and its proper implementation sees the highest literacy rate in India.
